item.description: Coursework Practical Data Science https://www.unifyingdatascience.org/html/index.html https://noahgift.github.io/cloud-data-analysis-at-scale/ Data Science https://statquest.org Quality of Life Opening jupyter notebooks by double clicking - https://samedwardes.com/post/2020-01-31-open-ipynb-with-double-click/ online collaborative LaTeX editor - https://www.overleaf.com OCR application to capture LaTeX - https://mathpix.com
